comment: A let down in terms of presentation and flavor. The Tun series is much better and Macallan Rare blew it out of water. Still glad I did it but hindsight I would have picked another 30. This is from a balvenie regular
So disappointing. The only thing I got in addition to the 21 was gasoline - or acetone, as the whiskey exchange says. Strange... 90 points, really not worth the crazy price
Sweet fruity palate.  Not peaty at all.
The smoothness you expect from a Balvenie and a 30 year
